definition: inscription/autograph
surname Ti
topic/problem for discussion/exam question/subject/to inscribe/to mention/CL:個|个[ge4],道[dao4]
letter/symbol/character/word/CL:個|个[ge4]/courtesy or style name traditionally given to males aged 20 in dynastic China

sentences.english: The inscription on the wall of Hongjia Big Room was written by Gu Longxian's military unit of the Taiping Rebellion Army.
sentences.chinese: 洪家大屋官廳牆壁上的題字是太平軍古隆賢部所爲。

sentences.english: Mandarin inscriptions fill the museum’s guest books.
sentences.chinese: 訪客留名簿上寫滿了漢字題字。

sentences.english: The memorial book that Shen Junru sent to Xian Ying's daughter.
sentences.chinese: 沈鈞儒題字並送給鮮英女兒的紀念冊。

sentences.english: On the flyleaf was an inscription to me.
sentences.chinese: 在扉頁上題字是送給我的。

sentences.english: The inscription seems to have been worn away.
Square on the inscription of the book are Hanlin single Lanting, dignified and elegant font.
sentences.chinese: 坊上題字均爲翰林單蘭亭所書，字體端莊幽雅。

sentences.english: The inscription became a prelude of the surrender of Gu's military unit to the Qing army ten months later.
sentences.chinese: 題字成爲十個月後該部全體投降清軍的前奏曲。

sentences.english: After he had finished speech, the French President was given an inscribed commemorative plaque from Peking University.
sentences.chinese: 演講結束後，贈予了法國總統北京大學題字留念匾。

definition: inscription/dedication
in one's own handwriting
to write or draw with a brush/to put pen to paper/to write
rhyming couplet/pair of lines of verse written vertically down the sides of a doorway/CL:副[fu4],幅[fu2]
to write a letter (to the authorities)/to present a petition
portrait/to do a portrait of sb
autograph/to sign one's name
to inscribe a poem (often, composed on the spot) on a painting, fan or ceramic bowl etc as a work of calligraphy/an inscribed poem
to give as a present/to repel/to bestow an honorary title after death (old)
couplet (hung on the columns of a hall)
drawing/picture
grandson/descendant
surname Sun
to write the title of a book on a label
to draw/to paint
picture album
surname Jiang/refers to Chiang Kai-shek 蔣介石|蒋介石
